channel.title: DeathlyPkz - 317/562 // PKing And Economy! [OFFLINE]!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/ZgXXOtB.png[/img][/center]
[size=36pt]This Thread was updated: November-01-15 @ 11:45AM
wish I could of had the chance to do Halloween event, maybe next year :(
Server Status: Offline!
Server is offline because we only had one supporter, no one else decided to help me keep server online. I don't have the cash to keep it online therefore VPS ran out as well as webhosting. I backed up all data no worries. Server will come back from the dead when someone decides to send some donations, or if I ever get some spare change to give it another shot.
Donation Goal: $CAD 0/50
All donations can be sent to: StyleModzServices@hotmail.com [/size] [size=18pt][b]We[/b][/size] are new server resurrecting from the dead of 2012, We have fresh player list at the time of writing this thread are player list is only at about 20+ players, non active. We need active players! I'm constantly updating the server changing drop rates making economy more stable and could use everyones help! We have great pking with chaotics and much much more. Youll haft to log in to find out. Join now help us stay alive!
[center][b][size=14pt]www.DeathlyPkz.com[/size][/b][/center]
[center][b][size=14pt]www.DeathlyPkz.com/forums[/size][/b][/center]
[center][b][size=14pt]www.DeathlyPkz.com/vote.php[/size][/b][/center]
[center][b][size=14pt]www.DeathlyPkz.com/downloads/Client.jar[/size][/b][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/iSNr4pa.png[/img][/center]
[ul][li]Dicing (Removed from the game, only given to trusted ranks!)[/li] [li]Vote store[/li] [li]Donator cape gives almost double the XP![/li] [li]Curse prayer[/li] [li]Players shop[/li] [li]Donator island[/li] [li]All Tzhaar waves[/li] [li]Vote4Cash system[/li] [li]Money pouch[/li] [li]Clan chat + Lootshare[/li] [li]Perfect skillcape emotes[/li] [li]All 25 skill work perfectly[/li] [li]Perfect combat + perfect PVP[/li] [li]Dungeoneering & Pk'ing skills (Dung currently in beta stages!)[/li] [li]Quest cape require all stats 99[/li][/ul]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/VNyGI0e.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/M7lfx7S.png[/img][/center]
[br]
DIRECT CLIENT DOWNLOAD - http://deathlypkz.com/downloads/Client.jar

item.title: DeathlyPkz - 317/562 // PKing And Economy! [OFFLINE]!
item.dc:creator: @DeathlyInc DeathlyInc
item.description:
@DeathlyInc wrote:

Server is now offline, and awaiting a miracle to bring it back online
anyone who played server your accounts are backed up so if we ever come back online shall we meet again
I had alot of fun with this server met a lot of interesting and fun people to chill with. Met alot of people who were a lot like me
like to screw around on games grab the bong get real stoned and chillax. till next time.

Limitless, you were our first donator and you will not be forgotten. active player and nice guy in general.

And to our mod you know who you are, you are also a nice guy and active but not as much as limitless lol.

Read full topic

item.title: DeathlyPkz - 317/562 // PKing And Economy! [OFFLINE]!
item.dc:creator: @DeathlyInc DeathlyInc
item.description:
@DeathlyInc wrote:

[size=12pt]Thanks[size=12pt] Killa Kronic[/size], I appreciate it! Sad to see you leave. We are a growing community, nice respectful players, and Staff we are looking for people who would like to join that’s looking for place to chill and obtain nice items from either extremely hard bosses or the crystal key chest. The chest is a mystery you never know what your going to get until you look to see whats inside might be ashes might be a rare, or useless valuable item. Kill crawling hands in slayer tower to obtain the rare drop C-Key! Make money gear up and become the first millionaire! [size=14pt] Www.DeathlyPkz.com/downloads/Client.jar[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: DeathlyPkz - 317/562 // PKing And Economy! [OFFLINE]!
item.dc:creator: @killa_kronic killa kronic
item.description:
@killa_kronic wrote:

DeathlyInc:

Thanks limitless for the bump, we just got a player join and telling me he can offer us services and then said have fun going no where. I hate jelly bastards Anyone wanna join whos looking for a long lasting server with great community and support. Join you wont be disappointed.

Great Sorry I don’t plan on playing the server anymore sorry but good luck!

My small lasting time I can easily say this server has a great potential and this could be a top server.

Good luck with updates and server.

item.title: DeathlyPkz - 317/562 // PKing And Economy! [OFFLINE]!
item.dc:creator: @DeathlyInc DeathlyInc
item.description:
@DeathlyInc wrote:

No, keep it online I like it the way it is.

  • 3 (42.9%)
    Thank you Daily, seen you online about a week ago maybe not sure. Was very busy, just got a job at a fish plant going to be working 10-16 hours almost everyday. So i’m keeping the server online! Poll Ended. Hope to see some more new comers. If you are joing from mopar please reply back here and help bump us up and grab some new players! We only have a few active players online. Ive been inactive myself and logged in think no one was online but their was. I am currently recriting people looking for new active players Already gave someone a mod cape and still putting him to the test before he actually gets ranked. Come join guys im on right now for alil.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @DeathlyInc DeathlyInc
item.description:
@DeathlyInc wrote:

Scape Java how about you fly the f-out! I never created any of these accounts that replied to this thread lol your actually really sad thinking I created another account lmao. How about you contact a mopar staff member, report this thread and let them investigate the accounts just so they can prove you wrong so you can shut your mouth sad sad sad, can’t believe you would even think that. But thanks for the bump aha

item.title: DeathlyPkz - 317/562 // PKing And Economy! [OFFLINE]!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Lol. Why are you creating multiple accounts to bump your thread?

Thank-You for supporting US!

By donating you will be given a donators status in-game, where people will no longer recognize you as a new player.
You will be contributing to helping us keep the server Online, as well as this site!. This Server is costing me CAD $30.00 /Month
So I would really appreciate it if you help out. We are looking for staff currently so keep that in mind!

So, you’re indirectly implying you’re selling staff positions as well? hmm

Read full topic
